title: Selection menu bugs under TalkBack
body:
**Describe the bug**
The menu that appears when long-pressing an email is not exposed to TalkBack correctly. Instead, TalkBack often gets stuck on the "regular" menu below it and the only way to reach the selection menu is by using "Explore by touch".

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to your list of messages
2. Long-press a message to select it
3. Enable TalkBack by holding both volume buttons
4. Swipe right and listen to what TalkBack has to say

**Expected behavior**
TalkBack correctly reads the menu options like "Delete" and "Mark unread".

**Video**

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1885159/148403375-3a841a1b-7e59-4cb0-90fa-aeba9db4c7fe.mp4

What TalkBack says is displayed at the bottom of the screen. As you can see, it shows the "regular" menu options instead of the selection menu. When double-tapping on the "Delete" icon (which TalkBack mentions as "Search"), it actually searches instead of deleting.

**Environment (please complete the following information):**
 - K-9 Mail version: 5.806
 - Android version: 11
 - Device: Fairphone 3
 - Account type: IMAP

**Additional context**
I'm using TalkBack 2021-04-23 from F-Droid.
